snippet: A Florida judge is being asked to move this year's election dates — including postponing next month's primary — in order to draw up new congressional districts for the state....

headline.print_headline: Groups Ask to Move Florida Election, Draw New Map
headline.main: Groups Ask to Move Florida Election, Draw New Map

lead_paragraph: A Florida judge is being asked to move this year's election dates — including postponing next month's primary — in order to draw up new congressional districts for the state.
